text: 'uqsim allah taealaa bialnujum almkhtfyt anwarha nharana, aljariat walmsttrt fi abrajha, wallayl 'iidha 'aqbil bzlamh, walsubh 'iidha zahar dyawh, 'iina alquran latblygh rasul krym- hu jbryl ealayh alslam-, dhi quat fi tanfidh ma ywmr bh, sahb mkant rafieat eind allh, ttyeh almlaykt, mwtmn ealaa alwhy aladhi yunazil bh
